faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase for a full refund.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order has shipped, you will receive an email with a tracking number.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our customer support team at support@example.com or call us at (123) 456-7890.
